channel.title: KVM on Jupiter notes
channel.description: Recent content in KVM on Jupiter notes

item.title: Level up your KVM storage management with these tricks
item.description: qemu-img resize /path/to/disk.qcow2 50G qemu-img info /path/to/disk.qcow2 virt-sparsify --in-place /path/to/disk.qcow2 qemu-img convert /path/to/disk.qcow2 -O raw /another/path/disk.img
